channel.title: If you need help read this!
channel.description:
If you need help in anything to do with the following, then add me on skype: exotiicdeath
- Webdesign - Webdev - Java (Server sided) - Java (Client sided) - MySQL Highscores (any revision) - Portforwarding - VPS Setup - VPS Usage

item.title: If you need help read this!
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

fair enough, i just find replying on forums time taking. il try my best to help out on here then.

Read full topic
item.source: If you need help read this!

item.title: If you need help read this!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

No, don’t get me wrong I love people helping and taking an interest in website development. I take 5/6 PMs daily and have skype requests every time I sign in asking for help and resources and what not. I just don’t tend to like people giving out examples of deprecated code etc. If I had seen some of your work I’d happily reroute people to you but I just don’t want people being ill-informed.

This is why publicly posting it is easier, this way when someone posts and you post to help the people can see if your code is wrong, redundant and or deprecated.

Read full topic
item.source: If you need help read this!

item.title: If you need help read this!
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2, topic:481791”]Or they could just post in the respective sections.

I don’t see anything qualifying you to answer these questions over us.[/quote]

No there’s nothing qualifying me to answer over you, but thanks for being so respectful and considerate since im making your job a little bit easier

Read full topic
item.source: If you need help read this!

item.title: If you need help read this!
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“Bellend, post:1, topic:481791”]If you need help in anything to do with the following, then add me on skype: exotiicdeath

  • Webdesign
  • Webdev
  • Java (Server sided)
  • Java (Client sided)
  • MySQL Highscores (any revision)
  • Portforwarding
  • VPS Setup
  • VPS Usage[/quote]

I need a full explanation how how the POST method is vulerable to SQL injection plz. After your done I would like you to tell me the difference between SQLi and PDO. kthx

Read full topic
